title: Is it possible to have the korean font on euw for example?
body:
I would really like to change my font, I've tried to use Wooxy but it no longer works. Probablly due to riot removing the legacy client, and old files along with it. If anyone has any third-party program that works, I'd appreciate it. I really don't care if I get banned, I just want that slim font and it triggers me that I'm unable to switch to it. 

**Give us the option to switch from this shit** to this.

replies.body: Korean isn't one of the languages on EUW since there isn't a large number of players in the region that natively speak it, which is why the fonts are there for that language pack either. Just a forewarning, do be careful using any third-party programs since you never know what else might be attached like malware and such.
Same here. I just want that slimmer font.
